message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $18000. I believe it's a great value, and I'm confident it will be a great asset to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $15000. It's still a fair price considering the value of this product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit tight on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
